column2: "〔Impressive. I have seen the strength of your determination through your actions.〕"
"〔Rela of clan Ko, you have done well. Please rest now.〕"
"I'm getting the sense that these Dragonkin are really headstrong."

"〔Being able to take on the Dragonkin in spite of your
small stature... It is some feat.〕"
"It seems that the Dragonkin tend to fight first and ask questions later."
"〔I believe that you have come here... for this.〕"
"〔For some time, this has been here.〕〔Quietly sleeping.〕"
"〔Recently, it awoke.〕〔We did not know why.〕〔It appeared to be anticipating something.〕"
"〔A pact, and a debt.〕〔I feel that I must entrust this to you.〕〔Please, take it.〕"
"〔I have heard from Liu of clan Ko.〕〔The intruder has retreated.〕〔You, too, should return.〕"
"第６章 龍に託されたもの"
